de.mrapp.android.preference.multithreading

Class ColorPreviewLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.preference.multithreading.AbstractDataLoader<Bitmap,java.lang.Integer,ImageView,java.lang.Void>
      • de.mrapp.android.preference.multithreading.ColorPreviewLoader

  • public class ColorPreviewLoader
extends AbstractDataLoader<Bitmap,java.lang.Integer,ImageView,java.lang.Void>
    A data loader, which allows to load the previews of colors.
    Since:
    1.7.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ColorPreviewLoader(Context context, Drawable background, AbstractColorPickerPreference.PreviewShape shape, int size, int borderWidth, int borderColor)
      Creates a new data loader, which allows to create previews of colors.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ColorPreviewLoader

        public ColorPreviewLoader(@NonNull
                          Context context,
                          @Nullable
                          Drawable background,
                          @NonNull
                          AbstractColorPickerPreference.PreviewShape shape,
                          int size,
                          int borderWidth,
                          int borderColor)
        Creates a new data loader, which allows to create previews of colors.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used by the data loader, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        background - The background of the preview as an instance of the class Drawable or null, if no background should be shown
        shape - The shape of the preview as a value of the enum AbstractColorPickerPreference.PreviewShape. The shape may not be null
        size - The size of the preview as an Integer value in pixels. The size must be at least 1
        borderWidth - The border width of the preview as an Integer value in pixels. The border width must be at least 0
        borderColor - The border color of the preview as an Integer value

    • Method Detail

      • getBackground

        public final Drawable getBackground()
        Returns the background of the preview.
        Returns:
        The background of the preview as an instance of the class Drawable

      • setBackground

        public final void setBackground(@Nullable
                                Drawable background)
        Sets the background of the preview.
        Parameters:
        background - The background, which should be set, as an instance of the class Drawable or null, if no background should be shown

      • getShape

        public final AbstractColorPickerPreference.PreviewShape getShape()
        Returns the shape of the preview.
        Returns:
        The shape of the preview as a value of the enum AbstractColorPickerPreference.PreviewShape. The shape may either be CIRCLE or SQUARE

      • setShape

        public final void setShape(@NonNull
                           AbstractColorPickerPreference.PreviewShape shape)
        Sets the shape of the preview.
        Parameters:
        shape - The shape, which should be set, as a value of the enum AbstractColorPickerPreference.PreviewShape. The shape may not be null

      • getSize

        public final int getSize()
        Returns the size of the preview.
        Returns:
        The size of the preview as an Integer value in pixels

      • setSize

        public final void setSize(int size)
        Sets the size of the preview.
        Parameters:
        size - The size, which should be set, as an Integer value in pixels. The size must be at least 1

      • getBorderWidth

        public final int getBorderWidth()
        Returns the border width of the preview.
        Returns:
        The border width of the preview as an Integer value in pixels

        Sets the border width of the preview.
        Parameters:

      • getBorderColor

        Returns the border color of the preview.
        Returns:
        The border color of the preview as an Integer value

        public final void setBorderColor(int borderColor)
        Sets the border color of the preview.
        Parameters:
        borderColor - The border color, which should be set, as an Integer value

      • loadData

        protected final Bitmap loadData(@NonNull
                                java.lang.Integer color,
                                java.lang.Void... params)
        Description copied from class: AbstractDataLoader
        The method, which is invoked on implementing subclasses, in order to load the data, which corresponds to a specific key.
        Specified by:
        loadData in class AbstractDataLoader<Bitmap,java.lang.Integer,ImageView,java.lang.Void>
        Parameters:
        color - The key of the data, which should be loaded, as an instance of the generic type KeyType. The key may not be null
        params - An array, which may contain optional parameters, as an array of the generic type ParamType
        Returns:
        The data, which has been loaded, as an instance of the generic type DataType

      • showData

        protected final void showData(@NonNull
                              ImageView imageView,
                              @NonNull
                              Bitmap preview)
        Description copied from class: AbstractDataLoader
        The method, which is invoked on implementing subclasses, in order to show data after it has been loaded.
        Specified by:
        showData in class AbstractDataLoader<Bitmap,java.lang.Integer,ImageView,java.lang.Void>
        Parameters:
        imageView - The view, which should be used to show the data after it has been loaded, as an instance of the generic type ViewType. The view may not be null
        preview - The data, which should be shown, as an instance of the generic type DataType. The data may not be null
